author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Fujian Raynen Technology says dividend payment date on May 10
text:
May 4(Reuters) - Fujian Raynen Technology Co Ltd
* Says it will pay a cash dividend of 0.45 yuan (before tax) per share and use additional paid-in capital to distribute 0.4 new shares for every share for FY 2017, to shareholders of record on May 9
* Says the companyâ€™s shares will be traded ex-right and ex-dividend on May 10 and the dividend will be paid on May 10
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/qazs6K
